Smart Tape Dispenser: A smart tape dispenser that can detect the type of tape being used and dispense it accordingly. It can also keep track of the amount of tape used and alert the user when it's time to restock.

Tape Dispenser with Built-in Scissors: A tape dispenser with built-in scissors that can cut the tape to the desired length. This will eliminate the need for additional scissors and make the process of cutting tape more convenient.
Portable Tape Dispenser: A portable tape dispenser that can be carried around easily. It can be useful for people who need to work on the go or for those who have limited space in their office.
